plan(1,init, sentence(true,move(print,"[SONAR2] STARTS"),'','' ))
plan(2,init, sentence(true,move(actorOp,startSonarProcess,0,""),'','' ))
plan(3,init, sentence(true,move( switchplan(work) ),'','' ))
plan(4,init, sentence(true,move(print,"[SONAR2] ENDS"),'','' ))
plan(1,work, sentence(true,delay( 50) ,'','' ))
plan(2,work, sentence(true,move(actorOp,getDistanceFromSonar,0,""),'','' ))
plan(3,work, sentence( testNear( Distance),raise( sonar , sonar( sonar2,wall_e,Distance) )'),'','' ))
plan(4,work, sentence(true,repeatplan() ,'','' ))
